description: Try our easy to follow Finding Nemo's No Fish Tofu Tacos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Taco,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Tofu
name: Finding Nemo's No Fish Tofu Tacos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut tofu into 4 square slabs and press with paper towel to remove excess water. Using a fish-shaped cutter, cut out shapes and place into a baking dish.
In a medium bowl, combine 3 tbs chopped coriander, garlic and oil. Season with salt and pepper. Mix well to combine, add tofu and marinate for 10 minutes.
Coat each tofu fish with breadcrumbs, pressing on firmly. Return tofu to the baking dish and bake for 10-15 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine cabbages, carrot and 3 tbs coriander leaves in a bowl. Add juice of half a lime and season with salt and pepper.
In a small bowl, mix yoghurt, cumin and juice of half a lime.
To assemble your tacos, warm the tortillas as per packet instructions. Top each with shredded cabbage slaw, crispy tofu fish and drizzle with the yoghurt sauce. Serve with a lime wedge. Enjoy!
